articles.author: The Weather Channel
articles.title: Over 80 Crore People May Suffer From Lower Back Pain By 2050: Lancet | Weather.com - The Weather Channel
articles.description: Most significant increases in back pain cases expected in Asia and Africa,
articles.content:
More than 80 crore or 800 million people will suffer from lower back pain by 2050, a 36% increase from 2020, according to an analysis published in the journal Lancet Rheumatology.
